name: Solar System (itch) (Mike3305)
description:
This is my Solar System project. I added the following elements to scale other than the sun in terms of size but not distance to the sun. I also added a second comet spawner shooting comets in opposite directions.

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptun
  8. Pluto

Credits

Created by Mike Senecal
